    • HydroEnR-Welcome

    Optimise rating relationships on multiple limbs

    rateOptimise.Rd

    Optimises the rating relationships using the Levenberg-Marquardt algorithm

    rateOptimise(Discharge, Stage, control = NULL, ...)

    Arguments

    Discharge

    Flow series

    Stage

    Level/stage series

    control

    Change points in the rating

    ...

    Apply additional commands to the Non-linear Least Squares optimiser

    Value

    Examples

    #library(data.table)
#library(minpack.lm)
